players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Charlie is the mafioso and I investigated him. Trust me."
Diana: "Charlie, I need more evidence before believing your innocence. The accusation against you is serious and requires concrete proof."
You: "I have evidence that Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated him and found proof of his involvement."
